FAQ IT

What is WICKEDTEMPLATES?

Wicked Templates provides modern and easy to integrate HTML and Tailwind CSS templates.

How do I set it up?

Setup

1.- Install all dependencies.

npm i

You should be good to go.

What is your pricing??

The templates are sold as a is, free, bundle or individually.

The bundle will always include all the templates on the project, new updates and of course new versions of this ones.
